1.title: Design Marvels
1.plot: In the season premiere of "Property Envy," host Stephen Collins along with passionate property expert Jeff Lewis, prominent interior designer Mary McDonald and Chicago-based real estate guru Brandie Malay break down the world of luxury real estate, cutting-edge home technology and trendsetting décor. The panel shares their thoughts and opinions on three luxurious properties: a concrete paradise in Beverly Hills; a one-bedroom artist's getaway in the middle of Idaho; and a miraculous Moroccan oasis in Palm Desert.

2.title: Holy Houses
2.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay praise and condemn three religious-themed properties including a Zen-like stacked stone abode in Sedona, a former Lutheran church turned condo in Pittsburgh and a converted Miami Beach synagogue that is now a popular event space to the rich and famous.

3.title: Back to Nature
3.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis, Brandie Malay are joined by guest panelist and real estate expert, Million Dollar Listing New York's Ryan Serhant. The lively panel discusses and dissects the architecture and design of three distinct properties including a ranch with its own baseball diamond a few hours north of Los Angeles, a home built from a 100-year-old barn in Robinson, PA, and a Palm Springs pad with actual rocks coming up through the floors.

4.title: Best of Both Coasts
4.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay weigh in on three heavy-hitting properties including a Palm Beach estate that brings a taste of Tuscany to South Florida, a harbor house in Newport Beach with enough space to park a 90-foot yacht and a legendary home in the Hollywood Hills that's hosted movie stars and rock royalty.

5.title: Rock, Trees and Big Game Hunting
5.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay discuss, critique and guess the prices of three incredible properties including a modern day artist's colony in Big Sur complete with a guest house made out of wine vats, a Mediterranean home outside Atlanta that features an eye-popping collection from a big game hunter and the self-proclaimed 'House of Rock' in Santa Monica that includes its own recording studio.

6.title: Sin City
6.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay take a look at the good, the bad and the gaudy in three spectacular Las Vegas properties including a Henderson hideaway with a $100,000 staircase, a pink palazzo with Italian splendor and a decadent mansion just a few miles from the strip.

7.title: From Connecticut to California
7.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay compliment and lament over three very original properties: a Gatsby-esque west coast villa neighboring wealthy Silicon Valley; a one-of-a-kind gingerbread home in Connecticut; and a Santa Barbara ocean front home fit for a Hobbit.

8.title: Rooms with a View
8.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay along with guest panelist, Josh Flagg from Bravo's "Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles" revel and recoil over three pristine properties including a Hollywood Hideaway on 180 acres in Santa Barbara, a massive modern just six miles west of Miami and a spectacular spec house built around its exceptional view of the San Francisco bay.

9.title: Ridiculous Ranches
9.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay explore and evaluate three sprawling properties including a marvelous 1960's inspired modern in Palm Springs, CA, an enormous horse ranch in Arizona's Paradise Valley and a bayside beach house where the turf meets the surf just north of San Diego.

10.title: The Hamptons
10.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay dissect three properties located in the Luxe Hamptons including the windmill house in Amagansett that sits on five acres and once played home to Marilyn Monroe, a modern Montauk beach bunker impervious to all weather and a classy compound located on exclusive Shelter Island.

11.title: Big in Texas
11.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay welcome special guest Fredrik Eklund from "Million Dollar Listing New York" as they go deep into the heart of Texas and critique three very different properties including a townhouse in Houston with a touch of old London, a compound in Houston's most expensive suburb with over $30 million in interior design costs and the eccentric home of a pageant beauty queen.

12.title: Architectural Wonders
12.plot: Host Stephen Collins and panelists Mary McDonald, Jeff Lewis and Brandie Malay discuss three unique custom built properties including a historic craftsman in Los Angeles with over $5 million in renovations, a Connecticut modern that's nearly all windows and finally a ten thousand square foot La Jolla villa with five courtyards.

imdb.plot outline: For all those people who attend open houses with no real intention of buying, this studio-based talk show takes us inside unusual private homes, both on and off the market. Each week our esteemed design and real estate panelists will countdown the top homes and debate the merits of each, all culminating in choosing the property our panel envies most.
imdb.title: Property Envy
plot: For all those people who attend open houses with no real intention of buying, this studio-based talk show takes us inside unusual private homes, both on and off the market. Each week our esteemed design and real estate panelists will countdown the top homes and debate the merits of each, all culminating in choosing the property our panel envies most.::World of Wonder
